title: cmd/compile: generate opname array
body:
The comment in cmd/compile/internal/gc/opnames.go indicates that it was autogenerated by 'go tool dist', but that is clearly not the case now. (See CL 22495.) We should automatically generate it and document more clearly exactly how to do so. It is possible we should also generate it as part of make.bash.

Cc @davecheney
